name: before-that-resolves
description: Master Commander deck building and @openai/agents SDK through the stack

scripts.dev:lan: HOST=$(node scripts/lan-host.mjs) && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://$HOST:3001 npm run dev --workspace=client -- --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=server && npm run lint --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run test --workspace=client
scripts.container:build:arm:pdf: docker build --platform linux/arm64 --build-arg ENABLE_PDF=1 -f deploy/Dockerfile -t before-that-resolves .
